messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] amazement
messages.messageBody:
<< It reminds me of another quote from another book or movie, but I can't
quite put my finger on it.>>

>>It reminds me of lots of religious side-story stuff, about awakening, and
>>*seeing,* and mindfulness and knowing and...

How cool! I've never seen that movie. I should go rent it today.>>

It reminded me of The Matrix imeediately. (Sorry to keep mentioning it.) Did
anyone see Holy Man with Eddie Murphy? The story was dumb, but the message
was cool.

~Mary

*seeing,* and mindfulness and knowing and...

How cool! I've never seen that movie. I should go rent it today.


In a message dated 12/28/01 11:47:50 AM, JVilter@... writes:

<< It reminds me of another quote from another
book or movie, but I can't quite put my finger on it.

Jocelyn

MOVIE/TV QUOTE OF THE DAY

Patricia

My father says that almost the whole world is asleep. Everybody you know.
Everybody you see. Everybody you talk to. He says that only a few people are
awake and they live in a state of constant total amazement. >>

messages.subject: amazement
messages.msgSnippet: I thought this was a great quote.  I think this should be the goal of unschooling .  I took it from the newsletter I get every day from IMDb (internet movie
messages.messageBody:
I thought this was a great quote. I think this should be the goal of
unschooling<g>. I took it from the newsletter I get every day from IMDb
(internet movie data base). It reminds me of another quote from another
book or movie, but I can't quite put my finger on it.

Jocelyn

MOVIE/TV QUOTE OF THE DAY

Patricia

My father says that almost the whole world is asleep. Everybody you know.
Everybody you see. Everybody you talk to. He says that only a few people are
awake and they live in a state of constant total amazement.

From Joe Versus the Volcano (1990)
http://us.imdb.com/Title?0099892

More great quotes...
http://us.imdb.com/Sections/Quotes/
